title: Halsey finally confirms Evan Peters is her boyfriend following Yungblud split
text:
Halsey has finally confirmed that Evan Peters is her boyfriend after calling it quits with the punk rocker, Youngblud.

The Closer songstress appeared on The Ellen DeGeneres Show, where she spoke about her new beau.

And after being left terrified by an Evan lookalike, who sprung out at the star from behind a sofa, the 25-year-old opened up on her relationship.

‘You distracted me with the boyfriend question,’ she exclaimed as she jumped back from the Halloween trick.

Ellen chuckled: ‘That’s what you called the one-two-punch.’

Getting her breath back, the pop star laughed: ‘Yeah, I don’t know what’s scarier though, having to talk about my boyfriend on TV or having that happen. That was a double whammy.’

Halsey finally confirms Evan Peters is her boyfriend (Picture: FilmMagic)

They made their red carpet debut as a couple earlier this month (Picture: Rex)

Trying to get the conversation back on track, the host teased: ‘Well there you go, two scary things, yes, a double whammy.

‘Alright, yes, well we just wanted to scare you, that was probably one of the best scares we’ve done.’

But the Nightmare hitmaker didn’t seem too phased by the event, as she told Ellen: ‘You have the best job in the world.’

Halsey went public with the American Horror Story star as they celebrated the 100th episode of the Netflix hit on Saturday night, at Hollywood Forever in California.

She called the AHS star her boyfriend (Picture: FilmMagic)

Dressed as Sonny and Cher, the duo made their red carpet debut as a couple – and they completely rocked it.

The A-listers were first romantically linked in September when they were spotted holding hands at Six Flags Magic Mountain theme park.

An eyewitness told DailyMailTV that the pair seemed smitten and couldn’t keep their hands off each other.

‘They were laughing and flirting the whole time while we waited for the ride, it looked really romantic,’ the source said.

Halsey was most recently thought to have dated fellow singer Yungblud but they have not been pictured together in months.

Evan was famously in a longtime relationship with his AHS co-star Emma Roberts for seven years, but they split in March and she is now dating actor Garrett Hedlund.
